info.name: iCanGrow ERP API
info.description: Complete ERP API endpoints for iCanGrow cannabis cultivation management system

exec: console.log('No access token found. Please login first.');
// Global test script for ERP endpoints
pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Batch A",
  "strain": "Blue Dream",
  "strain_id": "{{strain_id}}",
  "cycle_id": "{{growth_cycle_id}}",
  "room": "Flower Room 1",
  "plant_count": 50,
  "start_date": "2024-01-15",
  "expected_harvest_date": "2024-04-15",
  "notes": "First batch of Blue Dream for Q1 2024"
}

{
  "current_stage": "flowering",
  "plant_count": 48,
  "strain": "Blue Dream",
  "strain_id": "{{strain_id}}",
  "notes": "Updated: 2 plants removed due to issues"
}

{
  "batch_id": "{{batch_id}}",
  "date": "2024-01-20",
  "stage": "vegetative",
  "temperature": 24.5,
  "humidity": 65,
  "ph_level": 6.2,
  "notes": "Plants looking healthy, slight yellowing on lower leaves"
}

{
  "batch_id": "{{batch_id}}",
  "waste_type": "plant_material",
  "quantity": 2.5,
  "unit": "kg",
  "disposal_date": "2024-01-25",
  "disposal_method": "compost",
  "reason": "Diseased plant material removed during inspection",
  "notes": "Material properly composted according to regulations"
}

{
  "qa_status": "approved",
  "final_quality_score": 8.5,
  "thc_percentage": 22.3,
  "cbd_percentage": 0.8,
  "moisture_content": 12.5,
  "review_notes": "Batch meets all quality standards. THC levels within expected range. Ready for packaging.",
  "reviewer_comments": "Excellent batch quality, consistent throughout. Recommend for premium tier."
}
